column4: Hal and Hald service dont start automatically when booting and every time I login to gutsy I must start them manualy? what do I do?
help.  Khajavi: Hal and Hald service dont start automatically when booting and every time I login to gutsy I must start them manualy? what do I do?

do you want to do it for everybody or just for a specific user?
